name: hi-words
description: Effortlessly grow your vocabulary as you read, with automatic highlighting and translation of unfamiliar words. (Personal fork with customizations)

scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && npm run copy-wasm
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

author: Chouann (fork based on CatMuse/HiWords)
